Nnamdi is a competent and highly skilled software developer who specializes in languages such as Javascript, HTML, CSS and React to build experiential software solutions such as websites and web applications. With experience successfully setting up and running a startup while working as Chief Operations Manager in the logistics and supply chain industry for 7 years, he has developed and shown strong leadership and entrepreneurial skills. Due to his passion for problem solving and innovation, he began a career in Software Development in 2019 by completing a 6 months program at CodeCademy New York and Stutern Software Development Bootcamp, simultaneously. He is currently seeking job opportunities to gain industry experience and hone his acquired skills.
